spec_data.Name: librtfcomp
spec_data.Description:
Library to read compressed RTF files (development files). Can decompress and
recompress compressed RTF and convert from UTF8 to RTF for use in things like
the AirSync protocols.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:12:07 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for reading of compressed RTF files
